init.description:
For a typical solar installation, there is no point in polling when the sun is down.

If the inverter is being used with an alternative DC source e.g. a wind turbine, polling may be appropriate.

After updating, it may be necessary to manually reload the intergration
init.title: EnaSolar Polling
